body_html:
The tensor2tensor team has had success with layer norm in sequential models but they use it in a very different way. It probably depends on the problem domain to see where it will work.

body:
The tensor2tensor team has had success with layer norm in sequential models
but they use it in a very different way.  It probably depends on the
problem domain to see where it will work.
